meanings.definition: (古語) 外側の色合い、外観

examples.sentence: The outhue of the building was a drab gray.
examples.translation: その建物の外観はくすんだ灰色だった。

usage_notes.explanation: This word is archaic and rarely used in modern English. It refers to the external color or appearance of something.

readability_explanation.text: The word "outhue" is an archaic term, meaning it is very old and not commonly used today. It refers to the external color or appearance of something. Because it is rarely used, it is considered an advanced vocabulary word.
